message: Fix token redirecting incorrectly on login when using non local domains.
Cleanup orphaned dist-info directories on comfy prestartup
Add verbose logging for troubleshooting installers via -v flag. Updated triton-windows version to match current Comfy PyTorch version.
Allow Nuvu sign in from any domain.
Add downloading models from manually input links including huggingface and civitai
Handle cu13 onnxruntime-gpu needing nightly version for now.
--no-warn-script-location removed from python install commands because uv does not support it.
Show spinning icon when workflow media  is loading
Fix workflow media  expiring and not rehydrating.
Fix poor authentication handling, make it clearer when user is logged in vs not logged in.
Make sure workflow install message shows in all cases. Make workflow card height remain consistent even when there aren't enough cards to fill the container.
Fix version retrieval for Nuvu Updater
Change default workflow sort to Newest. Show model links to subscribed users in model downloader.
Correct Nuvu versioning search to clear a log error
Add workflow changelog
Fix broken package installer for manual comfy install
More robust portable and manual install updater Handle file locks when custom nodes, ComfyUI, and Nuvu use conpiled python packages Allow switching Nuvu and ComfyUI version through the interface
More robust update methodology for both ComfyUI manual/portable and Nuvu
Display actual subgraph names on failed install Use uv with python portable not just venv Display correct number of installed models when less than all of the models fail to download.
Bump default installed torch version to 2.9.1 cu13.0 for Comfy Speed Boosts and memory management. Ensure huggingface token persists with Comfy Portable
Further clarity in Comfy Manager description
Fix portable installer sageattention and triton
Add better SEO for discovering Nuvu through Manager
Update Comfy Registry Message for better searchability
change text from gray to white
update bottom login dialog link to go straight to demo
update login dialog link to go straight to demo
Add logging that nuvu prestartup was successful
More robust update handling when a locked file absolutely cannot be cleared
Fix update flow when updating comfy or nuvu
Improve Comfy Manager Description
Refactor prestartup script to focus solely on installing uv, removing the handling of Nuvu requirements.
Fix prestartup to only handle uv for fast custom node install. do not try to handle nuvu requirements at all.
Fix prestartup package lock.
More robust Nuvu updating. Eliminates package lock issues.
Fix package lock issue when updating Nuvu
Update Comfy Registry description to include SageAttention and Triton installers for enhanced clarity on features.
Enhance LoginForm with external logo link and website reference. Add hover effects for logo and visit link.
Fix prestartup script not being included in github build
Update RunPod links to align with Nuvu Account
Add uv installer for faster and more reliable custom node installation. Add screenshots for support tickets
Update README Documentation
tag push doesn't work, need to trigger a dispatch github action
Fix github workflow to deploy to Comfy Registry correctly.
Fix version update in github workflow
Change Registry name from Nuvu to ComfyUI-Nuvu
Avoid popping new browser tab when running with --auto-launch cli arg
Add Nuvu to Comfy Manager Registry
correct discord link
Update README with correct branding, update documentation tab, and add Discord link.
Add optional sound checkbox to workflows tab
Add 'Skip updates' option for installed custom nodes in Install Missing. Install missing no longer in beta.
Improve workflow card readability
Auto-handle migration of ComfyUI from comfyanonymous to Comfy-Org git location
Update references to point to new ComfyUI Repo location
Fix bug when installing custom node packages that require models to be downloaded from huggingface
Correct Desktop & Start Menu Icon not showing correctly.
Fix strange git state
Fix strange git state. No feature updates.
Add desktop shortcuts and icon copying for Nuvu-ComfyUI installation scripts; remove VRAM checks from workflow components
Increase reliability of system VRAM check for whether a workflow can be run on a user's machine.
Add estimate of if user's hardware can run a workflow that they are installing.
Ensure process finishes when downloading multiple models on "Models" tab.
Refactor build_cython.py and setup.py to dynamically discover Python files for compilation, excluding __init__.py files. This improves maintainability by automating file management.
Add system optimization for better user experience
REAME syntax corrections, no Nuvu Plugin Chagnes.
Cleanup model files on failed downloads to avoid corrupted files breaking workflows.
Refactor CSS and JavaScript files for improved structure and readability. Update comfyui-nuvu.css for consistent styling and enhance nuvu.js by cleaning up imports and optimizing code structure.
Improve messaging when user's device is not registered, and allow analyzing a new workflow without having to refresh the page
Adjust logo paths to avoid unrendered logos

Update .gitignore to exclude log files and enhance GitHub Actions workflow to prevent log files from being uploaded. Clean up potential log files during build process for improved artifact management.
Merge: Accept incoming changes - restructure to src-frontend

Enhance Vite configuration to suppress specific warnings related to import.meta.url and adjust asset file naming for CSS. Update dialog.js to ensure correct base URL handling after bundling, and modify nuvu.js to reflect changes in module structure. Remove obsolete JavaScript files to streamline the codebase.

Update Vite configuration to improve build output structure and reserved names. Change output directory to 'dist' and adjust library entry points for better organization. Enhance reserved strings and names for ComfyUI integration. Update GitHub Actions workflow to reflect changes in build process and output paths. Modify extension path handling in JavaScript files to ensure compatibility with Vite's ignore feature.

Update README.md to replace logo image with a new design. Enhance changelog retrieval by implementing separate handling for Nuvu and ComfyUI repositories, improving error handling, and adding remote fetching capabilities for commit history. This update streamlines the process of obtaining the latest commit information for both repository types.

Refactor OptimizerPanel.vue and Sidebar.vue for improved button structure and update website URL. Clean up ChangelogModal.vue by removing unnecessary whitespace. Enhance version detection in nuvu_server.py with better error handling and formatting. Remove obsolete JavaScript files and update import paths in nuvu.js to reflect recent changes.

Update installation scripts and documentation to reflect repository name change from nuvu-Compiled to ComfyUI-Nuvu. Modify relevant paths and messages in linux_install_nuvu_comfyui.sh, windows_install_nuvu_comfyui.bat, and README.md for consistency. Adjust Docker entrypoint script to use the new repository name and ensure proper installation of custom nodes.

Enhance changelog retrieval in nuvu_server.py by detecting the current git branch before fetching commit history. Update command to prioritize remote tracking branches, improving version detection accuracy. This change streamlines the process of obtaining the latest commit information for better frontend integration.

Enhance version tracking in OptimizerPanel.vue and ChangelogModal.vue by adding hash information for Nuvu and ComfyUI components. Update changelog links to prioritize hash values for better accuracy. Modify nuvu_server.py to retrieve and store commit hashes alongside tags for improved version detection. Remove obsolete JavaScript files and update import paths in nuvu.js to reflect recent changes.
Remove obsolete JavaScript files: auth-pil8uz3l.js and main-BYFDc9sq.js. Update import paths in nuvu.js to reflect changes in module structure.

Refactor version detection logic in ChangelogModal.vue to improve accuracy. Enhance matching criteria for current version by prioritizing hash checks, followed by tag comparisons, and fallback to short hash checks. Clean up version strings for consistent comparison.

Update changelog retrieval logic in nuvu_server.py to fetch the last 100 commits and improve version detection in the frontend. Enhance OptimizerPanel.vue and ChangelogModal.vue to display current version indicators and update changelog links. Remove obsolete JavaScript files and ensure consistent styling in the changelog modal.

Refactor version detection in nuvu_server.py to streamline fallback logic for backend version retrieval. Ensure accurate detection of installed versions using pip commands and improve error handling. Remove redundant checks and enhance clarity in version assignment for both backend and frontend components.

Refactor version detection logic in nuvu_server.py to improve accuracy. Implement checks for installed backend version and fallback mechanisms using pip and changelog.json. Enhance frontend version retrieval by detecting git tags and reading from changelog.json if necessary. Update handling of version defaults for better reliability.

Implement changelog generation in CI workflow and integrate changelog modal in the dashboard. Add API endpoint to fetch changelog data from changelog.json or git log. Update frontend components to display changelog links and modal for Nuvu and ComfyUI updates.

Enhance Windows installation script by adding a configurable port for ComfyUI and updating the helper launcher to use this port. Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' across various frontend components and backend logging for consistency. Remove obsolete JavaScript files from the Vue directory.

Update batch scripts to include '--no-warn-script-location' flag for pip installations, enhancing compatibility and reducing warnings. Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' in various components for consistency across the application.

Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' across various components and files, including loading messages and system info displays. Update references in the backend to ensure consistency in directory naming and logging. Handle user cancellation in installation processes gracefully.
Merge branch 'stg'
Update batch script and CI workflow to reflect renaming of 'nuvu-Compiled' to 'ComfyUI-Nuvu' and include 'windows_install_portable_nuvu.bat' in the build process.
Merge branch 'stg'

Standardize method names in dialog.js for Nuvu app integration, changing 'isnuvuAppMounted', 'mountnuvuApp', and 'setnuvuView' to 'isNuvuAppMounted', 'mountNuvuApp', and 'setNuvuView' for consistency.
Update import path in nuvu.js to reflect changes in main.js, switching from 'main-DEw3n8uv.js' to 'main-CAKph1xX.js' for consistency with recent refactoring.
Standardize method name in main.js by changing 'setnuvuAuthenticated' to 'setNuvuAuthenticated' for consistency with Nuvu app integration naming conventions.

Standardize method names in main.js and dialog.js for Nuvu app integration, changing 'mountnuvuApp', 'unmountnuvuApp', 'isnuvuAppMounted', 'getnuvuAppRef', and 'setnuvuView' to 'mountNuvuApp', 'unmountNuvuApp', 'isNuvuAppMounted', 'getNuvuAppRef', and 'setNuvuView', respectively. Update import statements in nuvu.js to reflect these changes.
Update repository references from TheArtOfficial to nuvulabs across all files, including installation scripts, documentation, and Docker configurations.
Refactor dialog.js to standardize method names for Nuvu app integration, changing 'isNuvuAppMounted' and 'mountNuvuApp' to 'isnuvuAppMounted' and 'mountnuvuApp', respectively.
Rename ComfyUI-Nitra to ComfyUI-Nuvu across all files and update related documentation. Remove obsolete Nitra files and adjust logging messages accordingly.
Initial Commit from ArtOfficial gh transition
